# **About me**

I am a **PhD economist ,** with expertise in impact evaluation and applied development economics. My research agenda focuses on agriculture, sustainability, and rural development, with particular attention to the impacts of policies, technologies, and market interventions on productivity, livelihoods, and environmental outcomes.

I am currently a **postdoctoral researcher at the** [Alliance of Bioversity International and CIAT](https://alliancebioversityciat.org/), where I combine causal inference methods with field data to generate policy-relevant evidence for agri-food systems in developing countries.

## Education
